chain_mining.button.uninstall.hover: Click to uninstall this data pack! (Requires sufficient permission)
chain_mining.message.automatically_upgra: Note: This world has previously used an older version of the Chain Mining Data Pack!
chain_mining.message.automatically_downg: Warning: This world has previously used a newer version of the Chain Mining Data Pack!
Please be cautious, as it may cause issues!
chain_mining.message.too_old.line1: Note: This world has previously used a very old version of the Chain Mining Data Pack!
chain_mining.message.too_old.line3: It is recommended to uninstall this data pack and use the %s one for optimization!
chain_mining.message.upgrade_success: Automatically upgraded to the latest version! %s
chain_mining.message.data_pack.title: Chain Mining Data Pack
chain_mining.message.settings.title: Settings
chain_mining.message.instruction.title: Instructions
chain_mining.message.instruction.main.li: Supports mining all Ores, Logs, Stems, Rocks, and Crops;
Tool durability will be deducted based on the number of chained blocks, and enchantments will take effect;
Holding sneak can prevent triggering a chain-mining;
You can visit %s to update this data pack, or install the resource pack to change the language;
Please see More instructions for details or click Settings below to control the switches of chaining.
chain_mining.message.instruction.overwor: Coal Ore, Copper Ore, Iron Ore, Lapis Lazuli Ore, Redstone Ore, Gold Ore, Diamond Ore, Emerald Ore, and Amethyst Cluster
the deepslate variants of the first %s types
A proper pickaxe is required to trigger the chain mining.
chain_mining.message.instruction.nether_: Nether Quartz Ore, Nether Gold Ore, Gilded Blackstone, Ancient Debris, and Glowstone
A proper pickaxe is required to trigger the chain mining, except for Glowstone;
Using a tool to mine Glowstone will consume its durability, but the enchantments will take effect.
chain_mining.message.instruction.logs.ho: Oak Log, Spruce Log, Birch Log, Jungle Log, Acacia Log, Dark Oak Log, Mangrove Log, Mangrove Roots, Pale Oak Log, Cherry Log, Crimson Stem, and Warped Stem
chain_mining.message.instruction.logs.li: An axe is required to trigger the chain mining;
If the off-hand holds a hoe, a %s range of corresponding Leaves, Wart Blocks and Shroomlights will also be mined;
Mangrove Roots can be chained together with Mangrove Logs.
chain_mining.message.instruction.rocks.h: Andesite, Diorite, Granite, Tuff, Calcite, Amethyst Block, and Magma Block
chain_mining.message.instruction.rocks.l: A pickaxe is required to trigger the chain mining;
The default setting for this category is OFF! Unless specifically needed, %s turn it on in the settings (it may cause pickaxes to break instantly)
chain_mining.message.instruction.soft_cr: Wheat, Carrots, Potatoes, Beetroot, Nether Warts, Sugar Cane, and Sweet Berry Bushes
Only fully-grown crops can be chained, most of which will be automatically replanted after being mined;
Using a tool %s consume its durability, and the Fortune enchantment will take effect;
For Sugar Canes, the ones at the very bottom will not be automatically mined.
chain_mining.message.instruction.hard_cr: An axe is required to trigger the chain mining, except for Cactus;
Pumpkin Stems, Melon Stems, and Cactus at the very bottom will not be chain-mined;
Cocoa will be automatically replanted after being chain-mined.
chain_mining.message.changelog.title: Changelog
chain_mining.message.load_success: Chain Mining Data Pack has been loaded! %s %s %s
chain_mining.message.unload.title: Uninstall
chain_mining.message.unload_prompt.line1: You are trying to %s the Chain Mining Data Pack!
chain_mining.message.unload_prompt.line2: Please type %s in the chat to confirm the uninstallation!
chain_mining.message.unload_prompt.line3: This command is valid only if entered within 30 seconds.
chain_mining.message.unload_prompt.line4: Note: This operation is intended to remove related scoreboards and command storage.
chain_mining.message.unload_success.line: Uninstallation completed! Related scoreboards and command storage have been successfully removed!
Please remove this data pack from the world folder before reloading the world!
Note: You can also disable this data pack first using %s.
chain_mining.dialog.data_pack.title: Chain Mining Data Pack
chain_mining.dialog.main_menu.title: Main Menu
chain_mining.setting.loot.hover: When enabled, the drops from chain mining will be automatically teleported to your position.
